text: Zab Jigithek ne Hamangkhung-aphuii re-è thog chiih-è kho3:16: Zab Jigithek ne Hamangkhung-aphuii re-è thog chiih-è kho sapho; dinneZab Jigithek ne Hamangkhung-aphuii re-è thog jide kho sapho. ne izai shii yua, asi pha ji shii giung, biidiie shii khriig rek, chiih-è giang shii sieng pha nong phi,
